acceptOwner().details: Can only be called by the pending owner to ensure correctness

returns._0: Oracle version at `oracleVersion` with price transformed by payoff function

updatePendingOwner(address).details: Can only be called by the current owner      New owner does not take affect until that address calls `acceptOwner()`

acceptOwner().notice: Accepts and transfers the ownership of the contract to the pending owner

rate((uint256,uint256)).notice: Returns The per-second rate based on the provided `position`

sync().notice: Pass-through hook to call sync() on the oracle provider

updateUtilizationCurve((int128,int128,in.notice: Allows the contract owner to update the curve parameters
